sentences.en: a rifle with a telescopic sight
sentences.cn: 装有望远瞄准器的步枪

sentences.en: A telescopic device is used in conjunction with the prism.
sentences.cn: 棱镜与望远镜配合使用.

sentences.en: Any decent shot with telescopic sights could pick us off at random.
sentences.cn: 任何借助望远镜瞄准器的像样射手都可以随意把我们逐个干掉。

sentences.en: Application of image fiber bundles in telescopic sight is researched.
sentences.cn: 研究了传像束光纤加装在望远瞄准镜中的应用.

sentences.en: Dynamic Model and Simulation of Crane Telescopic Boom Control Circuit.
sentences.cn: 工程起重机伸缩臂控制回路动态模型与仿真.

sentences.en: Extend the telescopic antenna and adjust the angle for optimum reception.
sentences.cn: 请伸展伸缩式天线并调整角度以改善接收效果.

sentences.en: Fuzzy Reliability Analysis of Railway Crane Telescopic Jib under Stochastic Load.
sentences.cn: 随机载荷作用下铁路起重机伸缩臂模糊可靠性分析.

sentences.en: His telescopic observations are justly immortal.
sentences.cn: 他的望远镜观察结果当然是不朽的.

sentences.en: I accomplish this with a telescopic landing gear.
sentences.cn: 本人做到这一点的伸缩起落架.

sentences.en: Telescopic Stay for doors and lids. RH and LH application.
sentences.cn: 门和上盖用伸缩撑挡. 左右门均适用.

sentences.en: The primary advantage of a telescopic prosthesis is its retrievability.
sentences.cn: 套筒冠修复体的最主要优势是可修补性.

sentences.en: The structure, work principle and application of tubing telescopic unit is introduced.
sentences.cn: 简要介绍了管柱伸缩器的结构 、 工作原理及用途.

sentences.en: This telescopic umbrella has 8 close button is fitted into the handle.
sentences.cn: 这种折叠伞伞架有8根,开合伞的按钮在伞柄中.

sentences.en: Truck mounted telescopic cranes 30 ton meter up to 180 ton meter.
sentences.cn: 车载伸缩式起重机从30吨米到180吨米不等.

words.tran_cn: 用远距镜头照相的；摄远的
传真照片；传真电报；摄远镜头
望远镜使用法；[光] 望远镜制造学
缩短，压缩（telescope的过去分词形式）
[光]望远镜的；[眼科]远视的；套管式伸缩的；眼力好的；有先见之明的

trans.tran_cn: 伸缩的，望远镜的，（尤指镜片）能放大远处物体的，眼力好的
trans.tran_en: making distant things look bigger, like a telescope does
